LanguageData.Grot_Base_Child.title: Grotling
LanguageData.Grot_Base_Child.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Grotling, an infantile Gretchin, often confused with Snotlings, barely suitable for menial tasks.
LanguageData.Grot_Base.title: Grot Slave
LanguageData.Grot_Base.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Grot, the backbone of Ork society. Most menial tasks are performed by [PAWN_pronoun] kind.
LanguageData.Grot_Orderly.title: Grot orderly
LanguageData.Grot_Orderly.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a orderly. With an knack for knowing which bitz go where when it comes to stickin da boyz back togeather.
LanguageData.Grot_Tinkerer.title: Grot Tinkerer
LanguageData.Grot_Tinkerer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Tinkerer. With an knack for knowing which bitz go where when it comes to teknology.
LanguageData.Grot_TroubleMaker.title: Grot Trouble Maker
LanguageData.Grot_TroubleMaker.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Trouble Maker. With an knack for knowing how to whip iz mates into a frenzy.
LanguageData.Ork_Base_Child.title: yoof
LanguageData.Ork_Base_Child.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is Ork. As such, war is his only passion, with most basic menial tasks being performed only to fuel the warmachine.
LanguageData.Ork_Smart_Child.title: yoof
LanguageData.Ork_Smart_Child.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is Ork. As such, war is his only passion, with most basic menial tasks being performed only to fuel the warmachine.
LanguageData.Ork_Boy_Shoota.title: sharpshooter
LanguageData.Ork_Boy_Shoota.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has a knack for actually hitting a target when using projectiles. [PAWN_pronoun] is more accurate than your average ork.
LanguageData.Ork_Boy_Slugga.title: Slugga
LanguageData.Ork_Boy_Slugga.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s is motto is: Less talk, moar DAKKA! [PAWN_pronoun] loves to shoot, it doesnt matter what, although the result is less accurate than your average ork.
LanguageData.Ork_Boy_Choppa.title: Choppa
LanguageData.Ork_Boy_Choppa.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is earning his place in Ork society by being a terrific close-range fighter.
LanguageData.Ork_Boy_Brewer.title: Brewer
LanguageData.Ork_Boy_Brewer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has developed a rare talent among orks in that he's smart enough to brew stuff. Being an Ork, the result still tastes horrible and may be lethal to non-Orks.
LanguageData.Ork_Boy_Shouter.title: Shouta
LanguageData.Ork_Boy_Shouter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is infamous for his booming voice, being able to call out enemies over half a mile away.
LanguageData.Ork_Boy_Herda.title: Herda
LanguageData.Ork_Boy_Herda.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is known for his skill in handling squigs and other animals. Skill in this case often means beating the poor thing until it submits.
LanguageData.Ork_Boy_Mad.title: Madboy
LanguageData.Ork_Boy_Mad.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a madboy. With an intellect as thick as [PAWN_pronoun] skull, only the most basic tasks are suitable for this specimen.
LanguageData.OrkMekboy.title: Mekboy
LanguageData.OrkMekboy.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a mekboy. With an knack for knowing which bitz go where when it comes to teknology.
LanguageData.Ork_Boy_Doc.title: Mad doc
LanguageData.Ork_Boy_Doc.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a mad doc. With an knack for knowing which bitz go where when it comes to stickin da boyz back togeather.
LanguageData.Ork_Nob_Crusher.title: Crusher Nob
LanguageData.Ork_Nob_Crusher.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Nob, Bigger and badder than the average Ork, having survived countless battles and has proven his worth by viciously pummeling his opponents into the dirt.
LanguageData.Ork_Nob_Mek.title: Mek
LanguageData.Ork_Nob_Mek.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has proven his worth and achieved the rank of mek. With an knack for knowing which bitz go where when it comes to teknology.
LanguageData.Ork_Nob_Flash.title: Flash Git
LanguageData.Ork_Nob_Flash.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Nob, Bigger and badder than the average Ork, having survived countless battles.\n\n Known as a Flash Git for his fixation with the biggest and badest weapon he can get his hands on
LanguageData.Ork_Nob_Devastator.title: Devistata
LanguageData.Ork_Nob_Devastator.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Nob, Bigger and badder than the average Ork, having survived countless battles. Known as a "Devistata" due to a perticular proclivity for pyrotechnics.
LanguageData.Ork_Boss_Nob.title: Boss
LanguageData.Ork_Boss_Nob.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has achieved the rank of boss by being the bigger and tougher all his competition.
LanguageData.Ork_Boss_Mek.title: Big Mek
LanguageData.Ork_Boss_Mek.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has proven his worth and achieved the rank of BigMek. With an knack for knowing which bitz go where when it comes to teknology.
LanguageData.Ork_Weird_Child.title: Weird Runt
LanguageData.Ork_Weird_Child.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is Ork. As such, war is his only passion, with most basic menial tasks being performed only to fuel the warmachine.
LanguageData.Ork_Boy_Weird.title: Weirdboy
LanguageData.Ork_Boy_Weird.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Weirdboy. an ork of unusual mental capacity and is more intelligent than your average Ork
LanguageData.Ork_Nob_Weird.title: Weirdboy Nob
LanguageData.Ork_Nob_Weird.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Weirdboy Nob, Bigger and badder than the average Ork, having survived countless battles.\n\n An Ork of unusual mental capacity and is far more intelligent than your average Ork.
LanguageData.Ork_Boss_Weird.title: Prophet of Waaaaargh!
LanguageData.Ork_Boss_Weird.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is beholden to no tribe nor lord, only the whisperings of the Greenskin gods in his addled mind a Weirdboy Prophet of Waaaaargh!, hearld of Gork and Mork. an Immense Ork, Bigger and badder than even a Nob, having survived countless battles and almost a Warboss in his own right.
